headline: Private Equity Firms Feel the Tariff Pain
summary: Shares of the largest alternative asset managers, including Apollo Global Management and KKR, fell in after-hours trading. Shareholders are assessing how the Trump administration’s tariffs will affect interest rates, inflation, and the wider economy.

headline: Apollo to Announce First Quarter 2025 Financial Results on May 2, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, April 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) plans to release financial results for the first quarter 2025 on Friday, May 2, 2025, before the opening of trading on the New York Stock Exchange. Management will review Apollo’s financial results at 8:30 am ET via public webcast available on Apollo’s Investor Relations website at ir.apollo.com. A replay will be available one hour after the event. Apollo distributes its earnings releases via its website and email lists. Those inter

headline: TCW Relative Value Large Cap Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The Fed lowered rates by 25 bps at its December meeting but forecasted fewer cuts (two versus four) in 2025 due to inflation concerns. Read more here.
